example.text: Republicans are demanding that we gut income support for struggling families of more than 5,000 SC children. And if Dems don’t agree, they’re threatening national default. The MAGA GOP must stop holding the economy hostage to extract a ransom that would hurt poor kids.

While I would hope that House Republican leadership would recognize the harm caused by the Charleston loophole and would bring this bill to the floor for a vote, this discharge petition would make that happen even if they remain unwilling. With strong support in the Democratic Caucus, we just need a handful of Republican colleagues willing to put partisanship aside and do the right thing for the American people.

Just 2 weeks before the 1-year anniversary of the tragedy in Uvalde, TX, our nation is mourning another mass shooting in Allen, TX. Thoughts & prayers aren't enough. This epidemic won't end until we enact comprehensive gun violence prevention legislation. [[url]]
